title: Which of the Blackpink songs gives a good meaning or gives a slap to the society or has sweet meaning instead of dark? Why? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think the song that embodies a sweet message in the song instead of dark would be Stay, not only because of its sentimental and emotional ballad vibe that it gives off, but also for its message about love and longing for a lost one. Stay is about longing for time spent with someone who without doing much of anything, but yet the moments they have spent are still precious and special. It is about how spending that time with friends, rather than lovers can still feel special to them, and as they grow, they are slowly drifting apart, which calls for lost time with one another. This is represented by the members walking around with a hopeless and forlorn expression in their own respective scenes. It is folksy song with, a good blend of voices that all fall into a lower range, which makes the song more emotional and sad for the listeners. Each fo the vocals flow well int another and they all come together to make a good and cohesive piece, interwoven with emotion and sentiment. They also make a reference to Heaven by Talking Heads, in a scene on the marquis in the beginning, “Heaven is a place were nothing even happens,” and also referenced their lyrics in their song as well with a guitar instruments accompanying it, “It’s hard to imagine nothing at all, could be so exciting, could be so fun.” This expresses how being together with their friends, even just in their presence is enough to make then happy and for them to make good use of their time, and that just being together feels right and feels meant to be, and thus the wandering around of each member, shows that expression of loneliness they feel from the absence of the other. It seems theta their brand is much similar to Red Velvet as both have their black and pink side where black represents their girl crush, bad boy side and the pink is their delicate and elegant, and soft vibe where it involves more ballads. I think overall, it is a good message about friendship and how having friends by you is important to fit in the emptiness that they feel without them, and importance of one’s extinct in someone life, thus longing for them stay with them for all of eternity. It is a sweet and heartfelt message, yet it is also true to society, because we all feel moments of loneliness, but it is important to spend time with them to fill in that gap, and feel like yourself and happy, when in the world, it feels like happiness is so rare when you are not with that person. It really shows their vocals qualities and is moving the group to a different sound.
